title: Ayakashi Tennen Beans
original_name: あやかし天然ビーンズ
sinopse: Miya, Amatsu and Zen have been close friends ever since their childhood. One day, Miya falls in love with a cool high school student, Toujou-kun, so she decides to become his girlfriend. However, Amatsu secretly likes Miya. So, he uses all kinds of ways to interfere with her! Moreover, the three of them have a very huge secret!!
